Initializer# init(to:using:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
convenience init(
    to provider: any Connectable,
    using builder: NWParametersBuilder<ApplicationProtocol>
)
```

Available when `ApplicationProtocol` conforms to `MultiplexProtocol`.
